text: The Council shall not withhold information from the public regarding its operations, procedures, and decisions that would otherwise be subject to disclosure under subchapter II of Chapter 5 of Title 2.
historical:
Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 17-353 validated a previously made technical correction by substituting "Council" for "Board".

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 13-150, see notes following § 32-1601.

For Law 17-353, see notes following § 32-101.

DC CODE § 32-1613

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Disclosure of information by the Council.
